title:
Continuous PPG-Based Blood Pressure Monitoring Using Multi-Linear
  Regression
authors: Serj Haddad, Assim Boukhayma, Antonino Caizzone
abstract:
In this work, we present the Senbiosys blood pressure monitoring algorithm
(SB-BPM) that solely requires a photoplethysmography (PPG) signal. The
technology is based on pulse wave analysis (PWA) of PPG signals retrieved from
different body locations to continuously estimate the systolic blood pressure
(SBP) and the diastolic blood pressure (DBP).
